title: Glen Canyon National Recreation Area: Lake Powell Cooperators Group
body: Lake Powell Cooperators Group       The Lake Powell Cooperators Group provides a forum for information exchange between parties conducting water science research within Glen Canyon National Recreation Area.  This formal group includes representatives from state, federal, and tribal agencies, academia, industry, and other interested individuals.  Annual meetings are held in December.  Any interested party may attend by contacting Glen Canyon National Recreation Area at (928) 608-6200.  Â     Looking across Padre Bay
